```{bash}
export PATH=/usr/local/mysql/bin:$PATH 
mysql -u root -p
```

```{r}
install.packages("RMySQL")
library(RMySQL)
library(DBI)
```

```{r}
install.packages("RMariaDB")
library(DBI)
```

```{r}
con = dbConnect(RMySQL::MySQL(), dbname="sakila", user="root", password = "password!!", port=3306)
```


```{r}
con <- dbConnect(RMariaDB::MariaDB(),
      user = "root", password = "password!!", dbname = "sakila", port=3306)
```


```{sql, connection=con}
SHOW TABLES
```
```{sql, connection=con, max.print = 20}
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM film
```
